book.ice_and_fire_delight.landing_text: In this book, you can learn more about the content of the Ice and Fire Delight mod
book.ice_and_fire_delight.category.items: Silver Knife is a special knife made of silver, it is great for killing undead as it deals extra damage to them.
book.ice_and_fire_delight.category.drink: Fire lily extract is a concentrated substance derived from the fire lily. It is used as a sauce for dishes, but can also be simply drunk. When consumed, it gives the effect “Fire aspect” for 25 seconds.
book.ice_and_fire_delight.category.foods: Spicy shiny chips
Recipe
Spicy shiny chips are a variation of shiny chips with spices from the witherbones. When eaten, they give the effect “Fire Resistance” for 30 seconds and “Fire aspect” for 10 seconds.
Sea serpent meat is cooked in an furnace. Depending on the oven where the meat is cooked, the cooking time differs. The average cooking time is between 8 and 10 seconds.
book.ice_and_fire_delight.category.items: To make a sea serpent rolll, all you need is cooked rice and a sea serpent slice.
book.ice_and_fire_delight.category.foods: Chips from shiny scales
First you need to make a raw mini pizza blank, to make it you need to use two dragon bone doughs.
Chips from shiny scales are cooked in the furnace. It only takes 8 to 10 seconds for you to taste this snack!
Recipe
Recipe
effect.ice_and_fire_delight.dragons_migh: When attacking, it sets fires, slows down the victim and lightning gets into it
book.ice_and_fire_delight.category.foods: Recipe
book.ice_and_fire_delight.category.items: This knife is created, as you might have already understood, from the fang of the great poisonous beast - the Hydra. When hit, the victim gets the "Poison" effect for 10 seconds
effect.ice_and_fire_delight.dragon_flyin: Gives a flying effect like in creative.
book.ice_and_fire_delight.category.foods: Recipe
Mini pizza
advancements.root.descr: Enter a world of magical dishes
book.ice_and_fire_delight.category.foods: To make a sea serpent rolll, all you need is cooked rice and a sea serpent slice.
advancements.too_much_power.descr: Be blown up when eating dragon special pie
effect.ice_and_fire_delight.lightning_st: The attack strikes the victim with a bolt of lightning
book.ice_and_fire_delight.category.foods: The meat of this great sea monster is a delicacy in itself and a rare catch, but it is also an ingredient in more exquisite dishes.
Sea serpent slice is cooked in an furnace. Depending on the furnace where the meat is cooked, the cooking time differs. The average cooking time is between 5 and 8 seconds.

Fresh soup from sea serpent is cooked in a cooking pot. In addition to the meat of this great sea monster, the soup requires onions, potatoes and carrots. After the soup has been cooked, it is poured into a bowl.
All you need is a crafting table to create honey glazed Troll meat. In addition to the cooked Troll meat, the dish requires cooked rice and a bottle of honey.
Recipe
Sea serpent slice is a lighter snack than the sea serpent meat itself. It is eaten when you are either not very hungry or when you need a quick snack.
Sea serpent meat

advancements.rip_dragon_adv.title: Rest in peace Dragon

item.ice_and_fire_delight.tooltip.warnin: §l§cThis item may change a lot by release!
book.ice_and_fire_delight.category.foods: Troll meat is cooked in the furnace. You only have to wait 8 to 10 seconds for the meal.
Recipe
After our blank is ready, it is necessary to lay the tomato sauce on it, and after the cooked chicken cuts.
Ectoplasm jelly
This jelly is made in a cooking pot. All you need is two pieces of ghost ectoplasm. Throw it in the pot, mix it up, and you've got jelly!
Recipe
book.ice_and_fire_delight.category.drink: Lightning lily extract is prepared in a cooking pot. From the ingredients we need only 2 lightning lilies, we put it to boil and stir for 5 seconds, when ready pour the extract into an empty measuring cylinder.
advancements.feel_spicy.descr: Eat spicy chips from shiny scales
effect.ice_and_fire_delight.warming.desc: Resistance to the effect of “Ice aspect”
book.ice_and_fire_delight.category.foods: Ectoplasm jelly is a pretty rare dish, in fact it's almost harder to make than sea serpent fresh soup or honey-glazed troll meat. Why? Because there are at least some tricks and tactics against trolls and sea serpents, but almost nothing against ghosts.
Sea serpent fresh soup
This dish is made from a great sea monster, few were able to taste it, for few were able to defeat Sea Serpent.
Recipe
book.ice_and_fire_delight.category.drink: Lightning lily extract is a concentrated substance derived from the lightning lily. It is used as a sauce for dishes, but can also be simply drunk. When consumed, it gives the effect “Lightning Strike” for 25 seconds.
book.ice_and_fire_delight.category.foods: Later we need to cook our blank in the furnace, depending on the furnace the cooking time may be different.

Frost lily extract is prepared in a cooking pot. From the ingredients we need only 2 ice lilies, we put it to boil and stir for 5 seconds, when ready pour the extract into an empty measuring cylinder.
book.ice_and_fire_delight.category.foods: Mini pizza is an easy-to-make dish, it is not particularly caloric, but can be made from leftovers after battles with the great creatures that are dragons.

book.ice_and_fire_delight.category.foods: This snack is created from the scales of sea creatures, it is extremely quick to cook in the furnace, and it is also extremely quick to eat.
Sea serpent roll is a type of roll that uses sea serpent slice instead of regular fish slice.
Sea serpent roll
book.ice_and_fire_delight.category.drink: Frost lily extract is a concentrated substance derived from the ice lily. It is used as a sauce for dishes, but can also be simply drunk. When consumed, it gives the effect “Ice aspect” for 25 seconds.
jei.ice_and_fire_delight.troll_intestine: A rare item that falls out of a troll with a rare chance is used to create a sausage from a dragon.
book.ice_and_fire_delight.category.foods: This dish is made from trolls and is considered a delicacy and haute cuisine in the world. In addition to its distinctive flavor, it is also extremely hearty.
book.ice_and_fire_delight.category.items: This category tells about items from mod
book.ice_and_fire_delight.category.foods: Troll meat
Troll meat is strangely getting from trolls, it is quite rare, because if a troll goes out into the light he turns into a stone statue, so it can be obtained only at night.
